objects.text:
• Spinning Palm Tree
• Adjustable Leaf Bed
• Relaxing Hammock
• Includes 2 Pet Kitties

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This vibrant banner is divided into four quadrants, each with a distinct background color, forming a playful and eye-catching layout ideal for children's products. The upper-left quadrant (pink) features the brand name with the `brand` text layer. The top-right quadrant (cyan) displays the `heading` and `subheading` text layers, highlighting the product name in bold fonts. The bottom-left (purple) lists product features in the `description` text layer and showcases the `price` prominently. It also includes a call-to-action button composed of `cta_background` and `cta` text layers. The bottom-right quadrant (light green) presents the toy as a central focus using the `product_image` layer.

**Color Palette:**
- Pink: `#FF80AB`
- Cyan: `#4DD0E1`
- Purple: `#9575CD`
- Light Green: `#A5D6A7`
- White (text/icons): `#FFFFFF`
- Fuchsia (CTA button): `#FF4081`
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette ideal for children’s advertising. Dominant colors include bright pink (#F652A0) seen on the cat house, vibrant green (#2CBF83) on the palm leaves, and soft beige (#F6CFA4) as the base. These are harmoniously contrasted with accent colors like light purple (#CFA7E2), ocean blue (#4EB1D3), and cherry red (#E94466). The colors are used in a whimsical balance—greens and browns for nature-like grounding, while pinks, purples, and blues add a cheerful pop. Strategic placement of bright elements (like the red fish and pink house) highlights key features while maintaining visual unity.
